text: Antonio Horvath (3 January 1950 â€“ 23 May 2018) was a Chilean politician. He was born in Santiago de Chile. He served as a Deputy from 1990 to 1994, and as a Senator from 1994 to 2018. He resigned in March 2018 due to health issues. Horvath died in Santiago on 23 May 2018 of lymphoma at the age of 68.Fallece ex senador Antonio Horvath ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Politicians from Santiago
title: Antonio Horvath
